Dynamic CLI Data Visualizer

  

  








  
Keyboard Shortcuts:

  
    
    
  • Q: Quit
    • 
    
  • R: Reload CSV data
    • 
    
  • S: Save current plot config
    • 
    
  • L: Load saved plot config
    • 
    
  • H: Toggle this help
    • 
    
  • Arrow keys: Pan plot (if applicable)
    • 
    
  • +/-: Zoom in/out plot (if applicable)
    • 
    
  • Enter: Render plot
    • 
    
  • Tab navigation supported in controls
    •
